com.ibm.gaiandb.draw

Class DatabaseDiagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • Display
      • com.ibm.gaiandb.draw.DatabaseDiagram
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chart, Graph

    public abstract class DatabaseDiagram
extends Display
    An abstract class representing a prefuse diagram that retrieves its data from a prepared SQL statement.
    Author:
    Samir Talwar - stalwar@uk.ibm.com
